response.original_title: Funkmaster Flex Premieres Otis on Hot 97
response.overview: Funkmaster Flex premieres Jay Z and Kanye West's "Otis" on Hot 97.  It took him over 22 minutes to complete the 2:58 song once. He dropped 63 bombs during the premiere, and he restarted the track 25 times.  NEW YORK CITY, YOU LISTEN TO ME. IF YOU'RE NEAR A CONVENIENCE STORE RIGHT NOW, ANY TYPE OF 24-HOUR STORE, GO INTO THE STORE RIGHT NOW AND PUT YOUR HAND IN THE CASH REGISTER FOR NO REASON.
response.tagline: Funk Flex Premieres Otis on Hot 97
response.title: Funkmaster Flex Premieres Otis on Hot 97
